thread.title: Iran’s Asghar Farhadi Wins Foreign Film Oscar From Afar - WSJ
thread.title_full: Iran’s Asghar Farhadi Wins Foreign Film Oscar From Afar - WSJ

author: Asa Fitch
title: Iran’s Asghar Farhadi Wins Foreign Film Oscar From Afar - WSJ

organizations.name: asghar farhadi wins foreign film oscar from afar - wsj iran

text:
Iran’s Asghar Farhadi Wins Foreign Film Oscar From Afar Asghar Farhadi doesn’t attend ceremony after Trump administration order on foreign travel By @asafitch Updated Feb. 27, 2017 1:23 a.m. ET 
DUBAI—Sunday’s Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film is the second for Iranian director Asghar Farhadi, who won in the same category for 2011’s “A Separation.” 
Despite being ruled by a clerical regime that frequently inveighs against Western culture, Iran has a large and vibrant—albeit tightly monitored—movie industry. 
The... RELATED VIDEO London Screens Iranian Film 'The Salesman' on Oscar Night London Mayor Sadiq Khan organized the U.K. premiere of "The Salesman," by Iranian director Asghar Farhadi, on Sunday ahead of the Academy Awards ceremony as a protest against U.S. President Donald Trump's immigration policy.
